objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Comedy themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Comedy narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Comedy lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a humorous misunderstanding or funny situation involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a comedy context
Students engage in comedy themed role-play about daily routines and habits using informal register
Students create original comedy themed content about daily routines and habits in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Comedy scenario?
What hilarious or amusing might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Comedy story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Comedy perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this comedy scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Comedy situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using informal register in comedy context
Character B: Responding in informal register within comedy theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with hilarious
daily routines and habits with amusing
daily routines and habits with ridiculous

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Comedy theme: Humor, wit, funny situations

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Comedy themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
